channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed

item.title: Monthly news - November 2023
item.description:
Microsoft 365 DefenderMonthly newsNovember 2023 Edition
This is our monthly "What's new" blog post, summarizing product updates and various new assets we released over the past month across our Defender products. In this edition, we are looking at all the goodness from October 2023.
Legend:
Product videos
Webcast (recordings)
Docs on Microsoft
Blogs on Microsoft
GitHub
External
Product improvements
Previews / Announcements
Microsoft 365 Defender
Operationalizing Microsoft Security Copilot to Reinvent SOC Productivity. (Preview) Microsoft Security...
